description: A fresh and beautiful pasta salad recipe overflowing with tomatoes, avocado and cucumber, finished with a silky garlic and herb dressing. Perfect for a picnic.
keywords: Pasta salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Dec 2020,Vegan,Tomato,Avocado,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Pasta Salad With Summer Tomatoes & Herb Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling, salted water according to packet instructions. Drain, reserving 2 tbs cooking liquid. Refresh pasta under cold water.
Meanwhile place oil, vinegar, garlic, herbs and reserved cooking liquid in a small bowl. Season, then whisk with a fork to combine.
Place tomato, cucumber, onion, spinach and avocado in a large bowl. Add pasta and dressing, then toss to combine. Serve scattered with extra herbs.
